thread.title: ‘I hope you don’t get raped’ Former BNP member's rant shocks viewers in Channel 4 debate
thread.title_full: ‘I hope you don’t get raped’ Former BNP member's rant shocks viewers in Channel 4 debate

title: ‘I hope you don’t get raped’ Former BNP member's rant shocks viewers in Channel 4 debate
text:
One Twitter user wrote: “Absolutely reeling from the interview on Channel 4. Hard to believe that Jack Buckby was given air time.” 
Another tweeted: “Never give former BNP member Buckby airtime again @Channel4News.” CHANNEL 4 The former BNP member was a member of a discussion about UK immigration 
The pair were debating the so-called ‘alt-right’ in a Channel 4 News discussion when Buckby claimed he only wanted “people who are a drain on society” to be deported from Britain. 
Ms Ntumy, a political activist from the National Union of Students black students’ campaign, quickly questioned who gets to decide on who is considered a drain on society. 
He then accused her of faux-outrage, before producing the application form. CHANNEL 4 TWITTER Viewers were quick to condemn Buckby for his outburst 
Buckby stood for anti-Islam party Liberty GB in the Batley and Spen by-election in October 2016, receiving just 220 votes. 
The party, which has only been running since 2013, wants to ban all immigration to the UK for five years and reverse what it describes as ‘the Islamisation of Britain’. Related articles
